forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High around 5C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 42F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 29F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low around 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High 3C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High 37F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers developing after midnight. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers developing after midnight. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers during the evening. Then partly to mostly cloudy overnight. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow showers during the evening. Then partly to mostly cloudy overnight. Low 21F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers developing during the afternoon. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers around in the afternoon. High 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers changing to rain showers as the day progresses. High 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers changing to rain showers as the day progresses. High 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.
